scheme_name: Financial Assistance to Authors for Book Publication
brief_description: The scheme aims to support the state's eminent litterateurs, writers, poets, and authors by providing aid up to ₹2,00,000/- whose literary works remain unpublished due to financial constraints.
detailed_description: The &quot;Financial Assistance to Authors for Book Publication&quot; scheme was introduced by the Department of Culture, Government of Uttarakhand. The scheme aims to support the state&#39;s eminent litterateurs, writers, poets, and authors whose literary works remain unpublished due to financial constraints. Only permanent/native residents of the state whose works are not being published for financial reasons are eligible to receive financial assistance to publish their manuscripts.
benefits: Financial assistance of up to ₹2,00,000/- per author to cover book printing/publishing costs for unpublished manuscripts.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a native or permanent resident of Uttarakhand. The applicant should be an eminent litterateur, writer, author or poet. The applicant's literary work should remain unpublished solely due to lack of financial constraint.

steps: The Department of Culture issues an advertisement in daily newspapers announcing the scheme. Registration Process: Step 1: Visit to e-Services Apuni Sarkar ( https://eservices.uk.gov.in ) and click "Sign Up" on the Citizen Login page. Step 2: Fill in the registration form with your name, email, mobile number, etc., and click Submit. Step 3: You will receive your User ID and password via SMS on your registered mobile number. Application Process: Step 1: Navigate to the Citizen Login page and enter your User ID (email or mobile) and password, complete the captcha, then click Sign In. Step 2: Once logged in, your dashboard appears. Click "Apply for New Application" or similar to begin. Step 3: Choose the Fisheries department, from the list, select the specific scheme you wish to apply for. Step 4: The portal will list mandatory documents required and upload mandatory documents, after uploading, click Submit to proceed. Step 5: Enter all required details in the form (personal, land, bank, etc.). Use Save to save progress, preview to review, or Delete Draft to reset. Step 6: Once all fields are accurately filled, click Submit. You will receive an Application ID receipt, which you can download. Track Application and Approval: Step 1: The application goes to the concerned department for review. Step 2: You can track your application status on the portal using your Application ID.
A departmental committee, chaired by the Director of Culture and comprising literary experts, subject specialists from state universities, and financial officers, evaluates the manuscript.
Only after the committee recommendation is the financial assistance sanctioned and disbursed.

documents_required: Passport size photograph Manuscript Quotation for Book Printing Aadhaar Card Bank Account Details PAN Card Permanent Residence Certificate Proof of income Field of Expertise Certificate (Author/Writer)
